<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"201":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"account_id":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","description":"The Account identifier","readOnly":true},"created_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"The creation date-time.","readOnly":true},"id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"The resource identifier","readOnly":true},"queries_retrieved":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","description":"Total number of queries retrieved by the analytics provider.","readOnly":true},"retrievable_urls":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","description":"Number of URLs processable by the analytics provider based on the Account URL.","readOnly":true},"started_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"The started date-time.","readOnly":true},"status":{"type":"string","description":"Status of the sync process.","enum":["SCHEDULED","SYNCING","COMPLETED","ERROR","CANCELLED"],"readOnly":true},"stopped_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"The stopped date-time.","readOnly":true},"total_entities_updated":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","description":"Number of unique entities updated with analytics by this sync.","readOnly":true},"urls_in_dataset":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","description":"Number of total URLs retrieved from dataset entities","readOnly":true}},"title":"AnalyticsSync"}}},"description":"Created"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
